flawed_nl_solution:
He shoots 200*4=<<200*4=800>>800 shots per week
He can recover 800*0.2=<<800*0.2=160>>160 of those arrows
So he uses 800-160=<<800-160=640>>640 arrows a week
The cost for those arrows would come out to 640*5.5=$<<640*5.5=3520>>3520 per week
His team pays for 3520*0.7=$<<3520*0.7=2644>>2644 of that
So he has to pay 3520-2644=$<<3520-2644=876>>876 per week for arrows
#### 876

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 2464, not 2644. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
